entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C

Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 95 %

Dewpoint: -2.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
